name: Cardiovascular
description: Holistic, non-invasive care for heart health addressing root causes through natural therapies, diet, and lifestyle changes.

name: Endocrinal
description: Natural hormonal balance restoration for thyroid, diabetes, PCOD/PCOS, and metabolic disorders without lifelong medication.

name: Gastrointestinal
description: Root-cause treatment for digestive issues including IBS, constipation, acidity, and gut imbalances through naturopathy.

name: Metabolic Disorders
description: Natural management of blood sugar, cholesterol, and metabolic imbalances through lifestyle correction and holistic therapies.

name: Musculoskeletal
description: Drug-free relief for joint pain, arthritis, back pain, and mobility issues using yoga, massage, and natural therapies.

name: Respiratory
description: Natural treatment for asthma, bronchitis, sinusitis, and breathing problems through pranayama and clean healing environments.

name: Skin
description: Holistic skin healing for acne, eczema, and psoriasis addressing internal imbalances for long-term natural results.
